name: Conquistad'Or
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Stranded on an unknown island, you are looking for an ancient conquistador's gold. Find it, unveil the island's true nature but do not forget, all that glitters is not gold.

This game was made during Global Game Jam 2021 and has been tweaked to add the latest features that we didn't have time to add and fix major bugs. We had 48 hours to create a game by following the theme "Lost and Found".
